title: Hybrid-CS Learning Platform | NRPT (Next.js + Rails)
description: Build a next-generation hybrid learning management system that blends interactive course delivery with streamlined administration tools. Developed for Seed Programming under the guidance of Delta Labs, using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, and a Rails API backend.

title: BreezyBeds | MERN (Airbnb Clone)
description: Designed and launched a property rental platform inspired by Airbnb, complete with dedicated dashboards for guests, hosts, and admins. Built using Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and MongoDB.

title: Task Management Application | Next.js, TS, Tailwind CSS, Rails
description: Developed a productivity tool that allows users to organize their work into buckets and manage individual tasks. Features a Next.js interface connected to a Ruby on Rails API with RESTful architecture.
